arts.ttl: Predicted Lineups – Ex- Barcelona Prospect Gets Chance In Goal For Inter Milan vs Sassuolo
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu will give Spanish goalkeeper Josep Martinez his first game of the season in Sunday’s match against Sassuolo. According to Sky Sport, Chivu will make several changes from his last XI. arts.ttl: Argentina Megastar Resumes Full Training Ahead Of Inter Milan Vs Sassuolo Serie A Clash
arts.sum: Inter Milan captain Lautaro Martinez has returned to full training with his teammates, ahead of Sunday’s Serie A match against Sassuolo.
